links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (24,-191,504).
formula: If we define f(m,j,x)=sum(binomial(m,k)*stirling2(k,j)*x^(m-k),k=j..m) then a(n-2)=f(n,2,7), (n>=2). [From _Milan Janjic_, Apr 26 2009]a(n) = 24*a(n-1) - 191*a(n-2) + 504*a(n-3), n>=3. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 15 2011a(n) = 17*a(n-1) - 72*a(n-2) + 7^n,  n>=2. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 15 2011a(n) = 7^(n+2)/2 -8^(n+2) +9^(n+2)/2. - _. J. Mathar_, Mar 15 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
